newsitem.title: USA: HighwayMaster Q4 oper loss widens.
newsitem.headline: HighwayMaster Q4 oper loss widens.

text.p: (All data above 000s except per share numbers)

NOTE: HighwayMaster Communications Inc said operating income for the fourth quarter of 1995 did not include an extraordinary item of $317,000, or $0.01 per share, for a loss on the extinguishment of debt.
Operating income for fiscal 1995 did not include an extraordinary item of $6,980,000, or $0.34 per share, for a loss on the extinguishment of debt.

Net loss for the fourth quarter and fiscal year 1996 includes a combined charge of $2.5 million for the write-down of inventory and a loss provision for upgrade contracts yet to be completed. Net losses for the fourth quarter and fiscal year 1996 were $7,100,000, or $0.34 per share, and $33,377,000, or $1.73 per share, respectively.
